p: Inclusion criteria included the written consent and complete knowledge about the study; being diagnosed with FD based on the ROME III criteria as the presence of postprandial distress syndrome (PDS) (including postprandial fullness or early satiation) and epigastric pain syndrome (EPS) (including epigastric pain, or epigastric burning), for three months in the past six months; and dyspepsia symptoms with scores of 6 or higher on the 11-point Numerical Rating Scale (NRS) for more than 4 of the 14 days prior to registration were included in the study.
